title: The Whole Town Accuses (1956) French Comedy Directed by Claude Boissol

sources.title: The Whole Town Accuses (1956) French Comedy Directed by Claude Boissol
sources.description:
François, a struggling writer, finds a bag of money outside his door every morning. He uses it to help the town, buying gifts for children and funding projects. Gangsters, thinking he’s one of them, demand a share. Accused of theft, François is arrested, and the townspeople turn against him. 

Director: Claude Boissol
Writers: Claude Boissol, Georges Combret
Stars: Jean Marais, Etchika Choureau, Noël Roquevert
Genres: French Cinema, Comedy
